import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import logger from"redux-logger";import rootReducer from"./Reducers";// Note: this API requires redux@>=3.1.0
var composeEnhancers=typeof window!=="undefined"&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk,logger)));export default store;
